description: This file defines the IGuide interface and its nested INotification interface for the WPEFramework project. It provides method declarations related to television guide functionalities, including getting channel and program information, parental control settings, and notification registration.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: An interface to interact with the TV guide, providing methods to retrieve channel/program info, parental controls, and notification registration.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: A nested interface within IGuide for handling notifications such as EIT broadcast, emergency alerts, and parental control changes.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the parser with the given shell

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Retrieves the current program for a given channel

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets available audio languages for a program

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Gets available subtitle languages for a program

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is enabled

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Sets or clears parental lock on a channel or program

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if a given channel or program is parental locked

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
